name: stonily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no sympathy or kindness: She glared back at him stonily. The audience remained stonily silent.
More examplesFewer examplesThe guard refused to answer her questions and stared stonily ahead.The couple sat stonily at the table, saying nothing to each other. "None of it is true," he replied stonily.Lukas slowly raised himself upright in the chair and stared stonily at him for a full ten seconds without saying a word.The two men both gazed stonily at their boots.
